Class ARELFragmentActivity

java.lang.Object
  FragmentActivity
      com.metaio.sdk.ARViewFragmentActivity
          com.metaio.sdk.ARELFragmentActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.view.View.OnTouchListener, MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
public class ARELFragmentActivity
extends ARViewFragmentActivity

This example shows how an AREL scene can be loaded and displayed

onDrawFrame

public void onDrawFrame()
Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
This is called when metaio SDK should render next frame. The callback implementation must call IMetaioSDK.render() to update.

Specified by:

Overrides:

onSurfaceCreated

public void onSurfaceCreated()
Description copied from class: ARViewFragmentActivity
This function will be called, right after the OpenGL context was created. All calls to metaio SDK must be done after this callback has been triggered.

Specified by:
onSurfaceCreated in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
Overrides:
onSurfaceCreated in class ARViewFragmentActivity
See Also:
getAudioRenderer

onSurfaceChanged

public void onSurfaceChanged(int width,
                             int height)
Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
Called when OpenGL surface is resized. The new dimensions must be passed to metaioSDK by calling metaioSDK.resizeRenderer.

Specified by:
onSurfaceChanged in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
Overrides:
onSurfaceChanged in class ARViewFragmentActivity
Parameters:
width - Width of the surface view
height - Height of the surface view
